name: ChurchHistoryToday
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: church history today
Developer Terms of Use
des: This skill tells you what significant Church or world events happened on the current day of the year. For example, on January 10th, the skill will tell you what has happened in Church history on January 10th in the past. It draws on events that occurred anytime between 1820 and the present day. Source for all information comes from Church News, "Historical chronology of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints"
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
